titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Sanders. Without written report.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs from March 1, 2013, through September 30, 2013.
